"That is only one example of the close ties woven between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown , when they were prime ministers, and Cameron now, and the Murdoch camp- the private meetings and dinners, the calls( no hacking there) and the mutual interest. We once used to think of the establishment as being cabinet ministers, archbishops, BBC panjandrums, leaders of industry and royalty. No longer.
